sentences.english: Mum should make her words clear so that I will not misunderstand her.
sentences.chinese: 請媽媽以後把話說明白一點，不要讓我半懂不懂。

sentences.english: He used so many archaisms in his speech that half of it was barely intelligible.
sentences.chinese: 他對人說話，總是滿口之乎者也，叫人半懂不懂的。

to not know the reason/to not know what to do
